attributes.action: recognise the pension rights of RAF Regular Service Men Pre 1975
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I served my country for 5 years in the RAF (1956-1961),and also served for 5 years as a Prison Officer from 1963 to
1971,and have not received a Pension for those 10 years.We wish parity with those servicemen who joined after 1975,and who qualify after 18 months. Service
